content.html: Interesting to see that the latest release of phpMyAdmin (used to enable a vast number of websites, and a tool I haven't installed in years) replaces "master/slave" terms with "primary/replica". Hope can spring from unexpected places. phpmyadmin.net/files/5.2.0/
